text: The 2019 USA Rugby League season is the 22nd season overall of semi- professional rugby league competition in the United States and the 8th season under the governance of the USARL. ==Teams== {| Southwest Florida Copperheads took their place. *Northern Virginia Eagles forfeited the game against Brooklyn Kings. ===Conference Championships=== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" style="border- collapse:collapse; font-size:90%; text-align:center;" ! rowspan="2" width="19%" |Home ! rowspan="2" width="6%" |Score ! rowspan="2" width="19%" |Away ! colspan="2" |Match Information |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! width="17%" |Date and Time ! width="22%" |Venue |- bgcolor="#F5FAFF" |Brooklyn Kings | 54-0 |Boston 13s |10 August 2019, TBD |Bushwick Inlet Park |- bgcolor="#F5FAFF" |Jacksonville Axemen | 28-6 |Tampa Mayhem |10 August 2019, TBD |UNF Rugby Field |- bgcolor="#C1D8FF" ! colspan="5" |Source: |} With the wins, Jacksonville Axemen are the Champions of the Southern Conference and the Brooklyn Kings are the Champions of the Northern Conference. ===National Championship=== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" style="border- collapse:collapse; font-size:90%; text-align:center;" ! rowspan="2" width="19%" |Home ! rowspan="2" width="6%" |Score ! rowspan="2" width="19%" |Away ! colspan="2" |Match Information |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! width="17%" |Date and Time ! width="22%" |Venue |- bgcolor="#F5FAFF" |Brooklyn Kings | 12 - 6 |Jacksonville Axemen |24 August 2019, 16:00 |Floyd Bennet Field |- bgcolor="#C1D8FF" ! colspan="5" |Source: |} ===Representative Game=== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse; font-size:90%; text-align:center;" ! rowspan="2" width="19%" |Home ! rowspan="2" width="6%" |Score ! rowspan="2" width="19%" |Away ! colspan="2" |Match Information |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! width="17%" |Date and Time ! width="22%" |Venue |- bgcolor="#F5FAFF" |South All Stars | 44 – 32 |North All Stars |7 September 2019, 16:00 |Tournament Sportsplex of Tampa Bay |- bgcolor="#C1D8FF" ! colspan="5" |Source: |} == Representative Game == ==References== Category:2019 in rugby league Category:USA Rugby League Category:Seasons in American rugby league
